On a failed save, the enemy falls {@condition prone}, and they can't stand up until there are fewer than two earth sparks within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Shatter Smash (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Snort Rocks (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 bludgeoning damage. If the target is a flying creature, they must succeed on a Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. The DC for this saving throw equals 12 plus the number of sparks who joined the attack.

trait.name: Flowing Form
entries: The essence can enter an enemy's space and stop there, and they can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Gasping Aura
entries: While within 10 feet of the essence, creatures who need to breathe can't take reactions or speak.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The essence makes two Breathless Rend attacks.

action.name: Breathless Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage.

bonus.name: Convocation of Breath (2/Day)
entries: The essence imbues the power of breath in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Hide in Breath.} The Elemental tries to hide inside the body of a creature within 10 feet of them who isn't a Construct, an Elemental, an Ooze, or an Undead. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or the Elemental retreats inside the target until the start of the Elemental's next turn. While inside the target, the Elemental can't take actions and has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the target.

{@b Toxic Breath.} The Elemental exudes a noxious aura 10 feet in every direction for 1 minute or until dispersed by a moderate or stronger wind. That area is lightly obscured, and each creature who needs to breathe who starts their turn in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Breathstealer's Shimmer (1/Day)
entries: The essence becomes {@condition invisible} then takes the Hide action. This invisibility ends if the essence makes an attack or uses Convocation of Breath.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The essence makes two Wind Talons attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Bluster or Lightning Squall, if available.

action.name: Wind Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bluster
entries: The essence unleashes a 30-foot cone of wind. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be moved up to 10 feet in any direction.

action.name: Lightning Squall (3/Day)
entries: The essence hurls a small lightning storm at a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage and is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, they take half as much damage and aren't {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}.

bonus.name: Convocation of Air (1/Day)
entries: The essence imbues the power of air in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Rising Whirlwind.} Each creature of the Elemental's choice within 30 feet of them must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw against a violent whirlwind. On a failed save, the target rises 10 feet upward and is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). A target {@condition restrained} in this way rises an additional 10 feet at the start of each of their turns. Another creature who can reach the target can use an action to pull them free of the effect, ending the {@condition restrained} condition for that creature. The whirlwind ends if the Elemental dies or chooses to end it (no action required).
{@b Vortex Terrain.} A vortex swirls around the Elemental. For 1 minute, the area within 20 feet of the Elemental is difficult terrain for enemies.

trait.name: Water Glide
entries: While within 5 feet of a liquid or solid surface, the essence gains a flying speed equal to their swimming speed. While flying, the essence doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The essence makes two Water Wing attacks and one Lightning Tail Whip attack.

action.name: Water Wing
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the same creature is hit twice with this attack on a turn, they are vulnerable to lightning damage until the end of the essence's turn.

action.name: Lightning Tail Whip
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from the essence.

bonus.name: Convocation of Water (1/Day)
entries: The essence imbues the power of water in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Scalding Steam.} The Elemental spouts blistering steam. Each non-Elemental creature within 15 feet of them must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

{@b Waters of Vitality.} The Elemental regains 25 hit points and can end one of the following conditions affecting them: {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, or {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Little Flames
entries: The spark sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more fire sparks, they take 6 fire damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the spark takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the spark takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Ember Claw (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 fire damage.

trait.name: Visceral Sight
entries: The force of blood can see any creature within 120 feet of them who isn't a Construct or an Undead. This sight ignores effects that obscure sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The force of blood makes three Scarlet Longspear attacks. They can replace one attack with a Rend from Within attack.

action.name: Scarlet Longspear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, the force of blood regains 5 hit points.

action.name: Rend from Within
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 26 ({@damage 4d12}) necrotic damage, and the target spends 1 Hit Die with no effect and can't take reactions until the start of their next turn. Miss: 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Convocation of Blood
entries: The force of blood imbues the power of blood in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Boiling Blood.} The Elemental boils the blood of a creature within 5 feet of them who isn't a Construct or an Undead. The target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target must choose to either take 27 ({@damage 5d10}) fire damage or make an attack with a weapon that has a damage die of {@damage 1d4} or greater against a creature of the Elemental's choice. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

{@b Essence Thief.} The Elemental steals the essence of two creatures the Elemental can see within 30 feet of them. Each target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 19 ({@damage 3d12}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The Elemental can then teleport to an unoccupied space they can see within 5 feet of one of the targets.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The force of earth can burrow through mundane, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the force of earth doesn't disturb the material they move through.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The force of earth makes two Earthbind Strike attacks.

action.name: Earthbind Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target's speed becomes 0 until the start of the force of earth's next turn.

action.name: Shatter Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 47 ({@damage 6d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage if the target is an object or structure.

bonus.name: Convocation of Earth (1/Day)
entries: The force of earth imbues the power of earth in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Earthen Aura.} Stones rapidly whir around the Elemental in a 10-foot-radius sphere for 1 minute or until they're killed or {@condition incapacitated}. A creature who isn't an Elemental takes 5 slashing damage for every 5 feet they move into or within that area.

{@b Stone Armor.} Stone grows over the Elemental in a protective carapace, and they gain 20 temporary hit points. While the Elemental has these temporary hit points, they are immune to the {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition petrified}, and {@condition stunned} conditions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The force of iron uses Form Stance then makes three Ferrous Blade attacks or three Iron Spike attacks.

action.name: Ferrous Greatblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. (20 ft. in Polearm Form), one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Iron Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Form Stance
entries: The force of iron shapes their body to gain one of the following benefits until the start of their next turn:

action.name: Polearm Form
entries: The force of iron's melee attacks have a reach of 20 feet instead of 5 feet.

action.name: Reckless Form
entries: The force of iron has advantage on all melee attack rolls, but attack rolls against the force of iron have advantage.

action.name: Shield Form
entries: The force of iron gains a +3 bonus to AC.

action.name: Fire Form (1/Day)
entries: The force of iron's attacks deal an extra 13 ({@damage 2d12}) fire damage on a hit.

bonus.name: Convocation of Iron (1/Day)
entries: The force of iron imbues the power of iron in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Earth Reinforcements.} Five {@creature earth spark|FleeMortals}s appear in unoccupied spaces within 20 feet of the Elemental. The sparks understand the Elemental, follow their verbal commands, and act immediately after the Elemental in the initiative order.

{@b Iron Skin.} Metal covers the Elemental, granting them resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for 1 minute or until their {@status concentration} is broken (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the oracle can cast the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):

trait.name: Turbulent Escalation
entries: When the oracle starts their turn outdoors while not {@condition incapacitated}, they can stoke a thunderstorm (no action required). For 1 minute or until the oracle uses Turbulent Escalation again, the weather in a 1-mile radius centered on the oracle changes as follows:

items: If the sky is cloudless, it becomes cloudy.
If the sky is cloudy, it begins to rain or snow (oracle's choice).
If it's raining or snowing, the weather becomes stormy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The oracle uses Tempest Bolt twice. They can replace one use with a Cyclone Staff attack.

action.name: Cyclone Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage, and the oracle moves the target up to 10 feet in any direction.

action.name: Tempest Bolt
entries: A bolt of lightning streaks from the oracle to strike one creature they can see within 90 feet of them, or within 300 feet of them if the target is outdoors and the weather is stormy. The target must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target is outdoors and the weather is stormy, they have disadvantage on the saving throw.

bonus.name: Convocation of Storms (2/Day)
entries: The oracle imbues the power of storm in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Lightning Within.} The Elemental becomes charged with lightning. The next time the Elemental hits a target with an attack within the next minute, the attack deals an extra 33 ({@damage 6d10}) lightning damage.

{@b Thunder Burst.} A concussive shock wave erupts from the Elemental toward four creatures they can see within 60 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage, be pushed up to 10 feet away from the Elemental, and be {@condition deafened} until the end of the target's next turn.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The principle regains 20 hit points at the start of their turn if they aren't {@condition incapacitated}. If they take fire damage, they only regain 10 hit points at the start of their next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The principle makes two Hampering Roots attacks or two Vernal Lash attacks.

action.name: Hampering Roots
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Vernal Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) slashing damage, and the principle moves the target up to 15 feet horizontally.

action.name: Burst from the Earth (1/Day)
entries: The principle causes three Large trees with whipping branches to sprout from the ground in unoccupied spaces the principle can see within 60 feet of them. Each tree has AC 15, 40 hit points, and immunity to psychic damage.

An enemy who starts their turn within 15 feet of one of these trees must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Convocation of Verdure (2/Day)
entries: The principle imbues the power of verdancy in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Roots of the Mind.} For 1 minute, the Elemental can link with each Large or larger plant object they can see within 90 feet of them (no action required). For the duration, the Elemental can perceive, make attacks, and use actions as if they were in the space of a linked plant.

{@b Thunder Burst.} Thorny vines burst from the Elemental. Each enemy the Elemental can see within 30 feet of them must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) piercing damage and is {@condition restrained} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, they take half as much damage and aren't {@condition restrained}.

trait.name: Corona
entries: The nexus sheds bright sunlight in a 120-foot radius and dim light for another 120 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nexus makes three Solar Arc attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Heavenly Collapse or Rejuvenating Flare, if available.

action.name: Solar Arc
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) radiant damage.

action.name: Heavenly Collapse (2/Day)
entries: The nexus shines harsh light on an enemy they can see within 60 feet of them. Each ally of the nexus within 5 feet of the target regains 20 hit points, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or lose any damage resistances they have and be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Rejuvenating Flare (1/Day)
entries: One ally the nexus can see within 30 feet of them is bathed in rejuvenating light. The ally regains 27 ({@damage 5d10}) hit points, and if they are {@condition charmed}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition poisoned}, those conditions end for them.

bonus.name: Convocation of Sunlight (2/Day)
entries: The nexus imbues the power of sunlight in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Healing Radiance.} The Elemental regains 30 hit points. Until the end of the nexus's next turn, the Elemental refracts shimmering light, and creatures within 10 feet of them who aren't Elementals are {@condition blinded}.

{@b Protective Light.} Four brilliant motes orbit the Elemental for 1 minute. When the Elemental deals damage to a creature with an attack, the Elemental can extinguish one mote (no action required) to deal an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage to that creature.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the spark takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the spark takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Whirlpool Suction
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more water sparks, the enemy must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have their speed reduced to 0. The DC for this saving throw equals 14 plus the number of water sparks within 5 feet of the enemy.

action.name: Whelming Wave (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}10 bludgeoning damage, and if the attack was made by more than one spark, the target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and be unable to stand up until the end of the sparks' next turn. The DC for this saving throw equals 14 plus the number of sparks who joined the attack.

monster.name: Atæshia

trait.name: Offer to Remembrance (3/Day)
entries: When Atæshia fails a saving throw, a willing creature within 60 feet of her who can see her can give their life to protect her. This creature dies instantly, and Atæshia succeeds on the saving throw.

trait.name: Reborn From War
entries: When Atæshia is reduced to 0 hit points, she disintegrates into ash on a solemn wind. For the next 100 years, if a Celestial, a Elemental, or a Humanoid whose challenge rating or level is 5 or higher dies within 60 feet of where Atæshia died, Atæshia returns to life where she died with 25 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Atæshia makes three Pale Flame attacks. She can replace one attack with a use of Moment of Loss, if available.

action.name: Pale Flame
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) radiant damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. If this attack reduces a creature to 0 hit points, they die and all their remains burn to nothing.

action.name: Moment of Loss {@recharge}
entries: Atæshia transforms one creature she can see within 60 feet of her into the form of a living ash cloud. While transformed to ash, the target is immune to all damage, can't provide cover to other creatures, and can't take reactions. At the start of the target's next turn, they reform and must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is reduced to 1 hit point. On a successful save, the target takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) necrotic damage. This damage can't reduce the target's hit points below 1.

action.name: From Death, Life (1/Day)
entries: Atæshia uses her Kindled Sacrifice villain action, even if it is unavailable, to sacrifice herself.

bonus.name: Flickering Flame
entries: Atæshia forms into a cloud of ash, teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 60 feet of her, and reforms into her true form. Each creature within 5 feet of the space she left must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Convocation of Ash
entries: When another Elemental Atæshia can see within 60 feet of her is hit with an attack, the damage from the attack is halved and the target can move up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendaryHeader: Atæshia has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Wave of Sorrow
entries: Atæshia unleashes a pulse of overwhelming sadness. Each enemy Atæshia can see within 120 feet of her must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature can't take reactions until the end of their next turn.

legendary.name: Action 2: Kindled Sacrifice
entries: Atæshia chooses a willing creature within 60 feet of her to die so their allies may live. The target dies, and up to two other dead creatures within 60 feet of the target return to life. These revived creatures regain the same number of hit points the sacrificed creature had, up to the revived creature's hit point maximum.

legendary.name: Action 3: Life's Finale
entries: Atæshia releases a torrent of primordial anguish to unmake the marrow of creation around her. Each enemy within 60 feet of her must make a {@dc 21} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, they take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage and can't regain hit points until the end of Atæshia's next turn. On a successful save, they take half as much damage, but suffer no other effect. Succeed or fail, if this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, they immediately fail one death saving throw.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Blood Curse)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d4 plus PB} necrotic damage, and the target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the seneschal's next turn. Beginning at 7th level, the seneschal can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Coagulate (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the seneschal empowers the blood of up to PB creatures within 30 feet of them. Each target can expend 1 Hit Die, rolling it and regaining hit points equal to twice the result plus their Constitution modifier.

action.name: 5th Level: Blood Puppet (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the seneschal chooses a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or move up to their speed in a direction of the seneschal's choice. During this movement, the seneschal can force them to make one attack against a creature of the seneschal's choice (no action required).

action.name: 7th Level: Blood Bondage (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the seneschal arrests the hearts of up to PB creatures within 30 feet of them. Each target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd6} necrotic damage and is {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition paralyzed}.

hp.special: Nine times their level (number of d12 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Molten Slam)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + PB} bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this attack ignites if it isn't being worn or carried. Beginning at 7th level, the bastion can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Burning Embrace (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the bastion makes a signature attack against a creature within range. If the attack hits, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, a target is {@condition restrained} and takes {@damage PBd6} fire damage at the start of each of their turns.

action.name: 5th Level: Melting Grasp (3/Day)
entries: When the bastion hits a creature with a signature attack, the creature takes an extra {@damage PBd4} fire damage. If the target is wielding a mundane metal weapon, the bastion partially melts the target's weapon, giving it a permanent -2 penalty to attack and damage rolls. If the target is wielding a supernatural metal weapon, the penalty lasts for 1 hour instead.

action.name: 7th Level: Eruption (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the bastion erupts, shooting a 30-foot cone of earth and lava from their head. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage PBd6} bludgeoning damage plus {@damage PBd6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}. The lava spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The elemental can burrow through mundane, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material they move through. While they use Earth Glide, the elemental can't be used as a mount.

action.name: Signature Attack (Slam)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Stretch Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The elemental makes a signature attack with a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and the elemental can pull the target 5 feet toward them.

action.name: 3rd Level: Earthshaker (5 Ferocity)
entries: The elemental strikes the ground, and each creature within 10 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. The elemental's caregiver automatically succeeds on this saving throw.

action.name: 5th Level: Transmute Ground (8 Ferocity)
entries: The elemental picks a 10-foot-square area of ground they can see within 30 feet of them. Each creature standing in the area must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or partially sink into the ground and become {@condition restrained}. A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength (Athletics) check, freeing themself or another creature within their reach on a success and ending the {@condition restrained} condition for the freed creature.

bonus.name: Toss Me
entries: While the elemental is within 5 feet of their caregiver, they can hurl the caregiver 5 × PB feet in any direction, including up. If the caregiver would normally take damage from a fall after being thrown, they can negate the damage with a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw.

trait.name: Healing Heat
entries: When the lightbearer targets a fire giant with an attack, spell, or other supernatural effect that deals fire damage, that target instead regains a number of hit points equal to the damage that would be dealt. The target can choose to be hit by this attack or fail their saving throw against this effect.

trait.name: Molten Flesh
entries: The first time a creature other than a fire giant touches the lightbearer or hits them with a melee attack on a turn, that creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lightbearer makes two attacks using Slam, Living Blaze, or both. They can replace one attack with a use of Flamelash.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the target must choose between being knocked {@condition prone} or pushed 10 feet away from the lightbearer.

action.name: Living Blaze
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 180 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) fire damage, and the lightbearer can ricochet the flame toward another target within 5 feet of the first. The lightbearer makes another spell attack roll against the second target with disadvantage, dealing the same damage on a hit.

action.name: Flamelash
entries: The lightbearer extends a whiplike flame to strike a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) fire damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, the lightbearer moves the target up to 10 feet horizontally.

bonus.name: Travel by Fire (3/Day)
entries: The lightbearer chooses two willing creatures they can see within 30 feet of them. Each target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and teleports, swapping places with the other target.

trait.name: Heat and Pressure
entries: When an enemy moves out of the red fist's reach, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or gain a level of {@condition exhaustion}. Creatures with resistance or immunity to fire damage are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Molten Flesh
entries: The first time a creature other than a fire giant touches the red fist or hits them with a melee attack on a turn, that creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The red fist makes two Unarmed Strike attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If the same creature is hit twice with this attack on a turn, they are {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 180 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 8d6 + 6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Guardian Block (3/Day)
entries: When an enemy within 10 feet of the red fist hits a creature other than the red fist with an attack, the red fist halves the damage dealt by that attack. The red fist then makes an Unarmed Strike against the attacker.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the trooper takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the trooper takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Molten Flesh
entries: The first time a creature other than a fire giant touches the trooper or hits them with a melee attack on a turn, that creature takes 7 fire damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}3 bludgeoning damage plus 3 fire damage, and the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. The DC for this saving throw equals 12 + the number of troopers who joined the group attack.

action.name: Rock (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}6 bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Zenith Aastrika

trait.name: Battle Tranquility (3/Day)
entries: When Aastrika fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead. When she does so, she can't use Sweltering Heat until the end of her next turn.

trait.name: Molten Flesh
entries: The first time a creature other than a fire giant touches Aastrika or hits her with a melee attack on a turn, that creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Aastrika takes the Disengage action and makes up to three attacks using Unarmed Strike, Hurl Flame, or both.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature, they are outlined in red light until the start of Aastrika's next turn, and for the duration, attack rolls against them have advantage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 180 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) fire damage.

action.name: Lava Pillar {@recharge 5}
entries: Aastrika causes a 20-foot-radius, 60-foot-high cylinder of lava to erupt from the ground at a point she can see within 120 feet of her. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 38 ({@damage 11d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Sweltering Heat
entries: Aastrika's inner flame pulses harshly. Each creature within 20 feet of her who doesn't have resistance or immunity to fire damage must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or gain a level of {@condition exhaustion}.

reaction.name: Power of Flame
entries: When another fire giant Aastrika can see within 60 feet of her misses with a weapon attack, Aastrika causes flame to trail from the attacker. The attacker rolls damage for the attack as if they had hit, and the target takes half that amount as fire damage instead of taking the full amount of normal damage.

legendaryHeader: Aastrika has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Forward!
entries: Aastrika and up to three creatures she can see can move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks and make one melee attack each.

legendary.name: Action 2: The Manifold Self
entries: Aastrika disappears in a flash of light and teleports, reappearing in an unoccupied space she can see within 30 feet of her. At the same time, five {@creature fire giant trooper|FleeMortals}s appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the space she teleported from. The troopers act immediately after this villain action is taken and on the same initiative count in subsequent rounds.

legendary.name: Action 3: This. Ends. Now
entries: Aastrika and each willing fire giant within 60 feet of her unleashes a burst of heat. Each creature within 10 feet of Aastrika or one of these fire giants must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Oncoming Storm
entries: Wisps of stinging snow and icy winds surround the storm hurler. When an enemy {@status concentration||concentrating} on a power, a spell, or a similar effect starts their turn within 15 feet of the storm hurler, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose {@status concentration}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The storm hurler makes two Ice Javelin attacks.

action.name: Ice Javelin
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 120/360 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Flower of Frost (3/Day)
entries: The storm hurler throws up to three Medium ice javelins, each at an unoccupied space they can see within 300 feet of them. These spaces must be within 30 feet of each other. The javelins have AC 13, 10 hit points, and vulnerability to fire damage. At the start of the storm hurler's next turn, any javelins with hit points remaining explode, showering icicles in a 20-foot radius. Creatures within the area of one or more explosions must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) cold damage and is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}. Objects within this area take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) cold damage.

reaction.name: Frozen Retribution
entries: When a creature within 120 feet of the storm hurler misses them with a ranged weapon attack, the storm hurler can manipulate the storm surrounding them to freeze the projectile and hurl it back at the attacker as an Ice Javelin attack.

trait.name: Crush Underfoot
entries: When the wind sprinter enters a Medium or smaller enemy's space, the enemy must choose to either fall {@condition prone} or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage. Each enemy can be affected by this trait only once per turn.

trait.name: Oncoming Storm
entries: Wisps of stinging snow and icy winds surround the wind sprinter. When an enemy {@status concentration||concentrating} on a power, a spell, or a similar effect starts their turn within 15 feet of the wind sprinter, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose {@status concentration}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wind sprinter makes two Ice Axe attacks.

action.name: Ice Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Blizzard Surge {@recharge 5}
entries: The wind sprinter moves up to their speed in a straight line. At any point during this move, they can make up to three Ice Axe attacks against different creatures.

reaction.name: Begone, Smallfolk!
entries: After a Medium or smaller creature makes an opportunity attack against the wind sprinter, the wind sprinter can make an Ice Axe attack against that creature.

trait.name: Distracted
entries: When the clobberer targets a creature with an attack, another creature within range of that attack can use their reaction to distract the clobberer. If the clobberer can see or hear the distracting creature, the clobberer targets them with the attack instead.

trait.name: Pummel
entries: When the clobberer hits a {@condition prone} creature with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage, and that target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The clobberer's attacks deal double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clobberer makes two attacks using Greatclub, Rock, or both.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Hill Quake
entries: The clobberer falls {@condition prone}, and each creature on the ground within 20 feet of the clobberer must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. Structures in that area take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Distracted
entries: When the flunky targets a creature with an attack, another creature within range of the attack can use their reaction to distract each flunky joining in the attack. Each flunky who can see or hear the distracting creature joins a group attack targeting that creature instead. If one or more flunkies can't see or hear the distracting creature, those flunkies join a separate group attack on the original target instead.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the flunky takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the flunky takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: The Hills Are Alive
entries: A Large or smaller creature who ends their turn within 10 feet of two or more flunkies must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

action.name: Rock (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}4 bludgeoning damage, or 5 bludgeoning damage if the target is {@condition prone}.

resist.note: from mundane attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the giant is indistinguishable from a statue.

trait.name: Stone Flesh
entries: When a creature attacks the giant with a melee weapon that isn't adamantine and rolls a 1 on the {@dice d20} for that attack, that weapon is destroyed if it is mundane. If that weapon is supernatural, it loses all supernatural properties for 1 hour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Rune-Signed Blade attacks. They can replace one attack with a Forked Knives attack.

action.name: Rune-Signed Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, each time they are hit by this attack, their movement speed is reduced by a cumulative 10 feet (to a minimum speed of 5 feet) until they regain at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Forked Knives
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature on the ground, they are knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition restrained} as they are pinned by the knife. The target or a creature who can reach the knife can use an action to make a {@dc 18} Strength (Athletics) check to try to dislodge the knife, freeing the pinned target and ending the {@condition restrained} condition on a success.

reaction.name: Resonate Rune
entries: When the giant is hit by a melee attack, each creature within 10 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the giant.

action.name: Rock

entries: Being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn't impose disadvantage on the giant's ranged attack rolls.

entries: When a creature attacks the giant with a melee weapon that isn't adamantine and rolls a 1 on the {@dice d20} for that attack, that weapon is destroyed if it is mundane. If that weapon is supernatural, it loses all supernatural properties for 1 hour.

entries: The giant makes two Greatsling attacks.

action.name: Greatsling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/240 feet, one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from the giant.

action.name: Boulder Roll {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant bowls a boulder in a 10-foot-wide, 30-foot-long line along the ground. Each creature in this line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) bludgeoning damage and falls {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall {@condition prone}. Each object in this line that isn't supernatural or worn or carried by a creature takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) bludgeoning damage. At the end of its roll, the boulder crumbles, creating a 10-foot square of difficult terrain.

bonus.name: Siege Stance
entries: The giant digs their heels into the ground, reducing their speed to 0. While in this stance, the normal and long ranges of the giant's Greatsling attack are doubled, and when this attack hits, each other creature within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage. The giant's stance lasts until they become {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, or {@condition restrained}, or until the giant ends it as a bonus action.

monster.name: Gibbering Mouther
languages: speaks all languages but doesn't understand any

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The gibbering mouther is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Primordial Influence
entries: A {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} enemy who starts their turn within 20 feet of the gibbering mouther must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, that creature's body is altered in an otherworldly way of the GM's choice—they might flicker in and out of reality, sprout miniature fingers from their fingers, or have their physical form altered in a similarly alien way. This alteration doesn't affect the creature's game statistics. A {@i cure ailment} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect reverses this alteration.

While altered in this way, a creature must repeat the saving throw whenever they finish a long rest. On a failed save, their previous alteration worsens or they experience another chaotic alteration of the GM's choice. If a creature fails this saving throw three times after their initial alteration, they transform into a gibbering mouther controlled by the GM, and only a {@spell wish} spell can restore the creature to their original form.

trait.name: Viscous Vicinity
entries: The gibbering mouther envelops their surroundings in their shifting reality. The area within 20 feet of them is difficult terrain for other creatures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gibbering mouther makes two Reality Rend attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Pull.

action.name: Reality Rend
entries: {@atk mp} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the gibbering mouther's next turn.

action.name: Pull
entries: The gibbering mouther warps reality around up to three creatures they can see within 60 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 30 feet directly toward the gibbering mouther.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: 1st Level: Stretch Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The gibbering mouther makes a signature attack with a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and the gibbering mouther can pull the target 5 feet toward them.

action.name: 3rd Level: Reality Pull (5 Ferocity)
entries: The gibbering mouther warps reality around up to PB enemies within 60 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 20 feet directly toward the gibbering mouther.

action.name: 5th Level: Vicinity Shift (8 Ferocity)
entries: The gibbering mouther and each ally within 30 feet of them gains a +PB bonus to damage rolls and has their speed doubled until the start of the gibbering mouther's next turn. Additionally, the gibbering mouther can make one signature attack as part of this action.

trait.name: Bloodscent
entries: The abyssal archer knows the location of each creature who doesn't have all their hit points within 60 feet of them.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target's walking speed is reduced by a cumulative 5 feet until they regain at least 1 hit point.

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the abyssal archer can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the abyssal archer moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The summoner makes two attacks using Bite, Three-Tail Flail, Fire Blast, or a combination of them. They can replace one attack with a use of Demonic Howl, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, another creature the summoner can see within 30 feet of them magically regains 7 ({@damage 2d6}) hit points. If this attack is made against a willing ally, it automatically hits.

action.name: Three-Tail Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 3d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet away from the summoner.

action.name: Fire Blast (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Demonic Howl {@recharge 5}
entries: Until the beginning of the summoner's next turn, each ally within 30 feet of the summoner who can hear them has advantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Uplift (3/Day)
entries: The gnoll magically turns an allied {@creature abyssal hyena|FleeMortals} into a {@creature gnoll marauder|FleeMortals} for 1 hour.

bonus.name: Summon Abyssal Hyenas (3/Day)
entries: The summoner summons {@dice 1d4 + 1} {@creature abyssal hyena|FleeMortals}s, who appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the summoner. The hyenas act immediately after the summoner's turn and follow the summoner's commands.

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the summoner can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the summoner moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bonesplitter makes two attacks using Bite, Spiked Flail, or both. They can replace one attack with a use of Bloody Roar, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage if the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Spiked Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the bonesplitter can't make Spiked Flail attacks.

action.name: Bloody Roar {@recharge}
entries: The bonesplitter roars, spitting a spray of blood. Each ally within 10 feet of them who can see them can make a weapon attack (no action required), provided that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

bonus.name: Over Here!
entries: The bonesplitter yanks a creature they are grappling. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or swap spaces with the bonesplitter.

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the bonesplitter can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the bonesplitter moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

action.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the cackler's next turn.

action.name: Moment of Brutality
entries: The cackler targets a creature they can see within 30 feet of them, magically flooding them with fury. The target must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw, which they can choose to fail. A creature who can't be {@condition charmed} succeeds on this saving throw automatically. On a failed save, the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage, then makes a Bite attack against a creature of the cackler's choice within 5 feet of the target. If the target has no Bite attack, they make an unarmed strike that deals piercing damage equal to {@damage 1d4} + their Strength modifier on a hit.

action.name: Fiendish Cackle {@recharge 5}
entries: The cackler unleashes a spine-chilling laugh. Each enemy within 30 feet of them who can hear them must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the cackler for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the cackler can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the cackler moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

reaction.name: Fell Teleport
entries: When a creature who the cackler can see within 30 feet of them dies, the cackler magically teleports into the space the creature occupied.

trait.name: Life Eater
entries: When an enemy the mage-gorger can see within 30 feet of them regains hit points, the mage-gorger chooses one non-minion ally they can see within 30 feet of them. That ally regains 2 hit points.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the mage-gorger takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the mage-gorger takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Wizard Ripper (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 slashing damage plus 2 acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage (mage-gorger's choice), and until the start of the mage-gorger's next turn, the target has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain {@status concentration}, including any Constitution saving throw triggered by this attack. Only one damage type is chosen for this attack regardless of how many mage-gorgers joined it.

trait.name: Rampaging Charge
entries: If the marauder moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and hits them with a Flail attack on the same turn, the marauder can make a Bite attack against that target as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the marauder can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the marauder moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

trait.name: Death Feast
entries: When an ally within 5 feet of the wildling is reduced to 0 hit points, the wildling can deal 1 piercing damage to a creature within 5 feet of them (no action required), provided the wildling isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the wildling takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the wildling takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Flail (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} by each wildling who joined the attack (escape {@dc 10} plus the number of wildlings who have it {@condition grappled}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the wildling can't make a Flail attack against another creature. A wildling can choose to release the {@condition grappled} creature while other wildlings still have them {@condition grappled}, reducing the escape DC accordingly.

trait.name: Death Snap
entries: When the hyena is reduced to 0 hit points, they can deal {@damage 1} piercing damage to a creature within 5 feet of them (no action required), provided they weren't {@condition incapacitated} before dropping to 0 hit points.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the hyena takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the hyena takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Bite (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1} piercing damage. If the target is a creature and two or more hyenas joined the attack, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of hyenas who joined the attack.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the demon's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the demon must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The demon can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the demon reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the demon consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the demon's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Trample
entries: The demon can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures as if they were difficult terrain. When the demon enters a creature's space for the first time on the demon's turn, the demon can make a Stomp attack against that creature (no action required). Additionally, the demon can end their turn in the space of a {@condition prone} creature who is Medium or smaller, and that creature can't stand up while in the demon's space.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) piercing damage. The demon can burn 1 soul to push the target up to 40 feet directly away from the demon.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet toward the demon.

reaction.name: Vengeful Charge (Costs 1 Soul)

action.name: Trample {@recharge}

The spider can make one Bladed Leg attack against each creature whose space they move into during the move. A creature hit by this attack can't take reactions until the start of their next turn.

Queen Bargnot succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is targeted with the same spell or effect as if they were in her space, and they fail their saving throw automatically.

legendary.name: Action 3: Kill!

headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the hag can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Envenom
entries: Each ally within 30 feet of the hag deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage with weapon attacks, provided the hag isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Granny Says

items: The target magically switches places with the hag.
The target uses their reaction, if available, to make an attack.

action.name: Naughty Mousey (3/Day; 5th-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: The hag chooses a creature they can see within 60 feet of them and attempts to transform them into a Beast of the hag's choice with a challenge rating of 2 or lower. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be transformed for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). While transformed, the target's game statistics are replaced by the statistics of the chosen Beast, though they retain their alignment, personality, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. The target's gear melds into the new form. They can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of their equipment. They can't speak or cast spells but can take any action the Beast can take. If the target drops to 0 hit points while in this form, they revert back to their original form with half the number of hit points they had before they transformed.

reaction.name: Get Gone
entries: When an ally within 30 feet of the hag is targeted with an attack, the hag can turn the target {@condition invisible} until the start of the target's next turn, potentially imposing disadvantage on the triggering attack roll and causing it to miss. To use this reaction, the hag must be able to see the ally and the attacker.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance

Creatures who can't be supernaturally put to sleep automatically succeed on this saving throw.

Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute or until they deal damage to another creature. While {@condition charmed}, the creature sees all allies as enemies and all enemies as allies.

action.name: Tiny Time
entries: The hag magically shrinks down to a height of 1 inch, becoming Tiny along with any items they wear or carry. While Tiny, the hag has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and they can use a bonus action to enter the head of an {@condition unconscious} Humanoid they can reach or to grow back to the hag's normal size. The hag's game statistics otherwise remain the same.

While the hag is inside a Humanoid's head, that Humanoid is considered haunted by the hag, and the hag has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the head. The hag can speak telepathically to the haunted Humanoid, but the Humanoid is unaware of the source of this telepathic speech. The haunted Humanoid can't gain any benefit from rest unless the hag allows it, and when the Humanoid attempts to sleep, the hag can fill the Humanoid's mind with nightmarish visions.

The hag is expelled from the head and grows back to their normal size if the haunted Humanoid is affected by a {@spell dispel evil and good} spell or similar supernatural effects, or if the hag chooses to exit the head as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Sleepwalk
entries: The hag moves one {@condition unconscious} creature they can see within 60 feet of them up to 30 feet horizontally.

reaction.name: Aren't You Tired?
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the hag hits them with an attack, the hag spits sleep dust at the attacker. The attacker must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, until the end of the hag's next turn, the attacker feels tremendously sleepy, they can't take reactions, and they have disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws. Creatures who can't be supernaturally put to sleep are immune to this effect.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the hag can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
will: {@spell create or destroy water}{@sup {@cite Casting Times|FleeMortals|A}}

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe both air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes one Lightning Strike attack and uses Dry Drowning.

action.name: Lightning Strike
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Dry Drowning
entries: The hag chooses a creature they can see within 120 feet of them, making the target feel as though their lungs are filling with water. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the hag's next turn. A creature who can breathe water or who doesn't need air automatically succeeds on this saving throw.

bonus.name: Sea Storm (1/Day; 3rd-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: The hag creates a roiling storm with a 60-foot radius centered on themself that moves with them and lasts for 1 minute. The hag has advantage on Lightning Strike attacks against targets in that area, and those attacks deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

reaction.name: Fearsome Glare
entries: When a creature the hag can see within 30 feet of them hits the hag with an attack, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the hag until the end of the hag's next turn.

monster.name: Shtriga Nonna

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Shtriga Nonna can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Feline Resilience (3/Day)
entries: When Shtriga Nonna fails a saving throw, she can immediately turn into a cat of her size (Medium in her normal form, Large while under the effect of Grow) and succeed instead. While in cat form, Shtriga Nonna retains her game statistics and ability to speak, except she can't cast spells or use Soul Steal. She reverts to her previous form at the end of her next turn.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Shtriga Nonna has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Shtriga Nonna makes two Corrosive Claw attacks. She can replace one attack with a use of Soul Steal, if available.

action.name: Corrosive Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. (10 ft. with Grow), one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) slashing damage while under the effect of Grow. If the target is wearing mundane metal armor, they must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity throw or their armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. If the armor is reduced to an AC of 10, it is destroyed.

action.name: Soul Steal {@recharge 5}
entries: Shtriga Nonna inhales deeply in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Shtriga Nonna regains 10 hit points for each creature who fails this saving throw.

bonus.name: Grow (2/Day; 3rd-Level Spell)
entries: For 1 minute, Shtriga Nonna magically increases in size, along with anything she is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, she is Large, her reach becomes 10 feet, she deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and she makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If Shtriga Nonna lacks the room to become Large, she attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

bonus.name: Gobble You Up
entries: Shtriga Nonna feeds on the body of an {@condition unconscious} creature within 5 feet of her. The target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage, and Shtriga Nonna recharges her Soul Steal action.

reaction.name: Turned Upside Down
entries: When a creature hits Shtriga Nonna with a melee attack, she magically reverses gravity around her. Each creature within 5 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or rise vertically 10 feet into the air. A creature levitating in this way remains suspended until the end of their next turn, then falls unless they have an ability that keeps them aloft.

legendaryHeader: Shtriga Nonna has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Snackies for Sweeties
entries: The air within 30 feet of Shtriga Nonna magically fills with the scent of rotten food. Each other creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). Creatures are affected even if they hold their breath or don't need to breathe.

legendary.name: Action 2: Feline Felicity
entries: Shtriga Nonna grows four cat legs in a burst of magical energy. Each creature within 5 feet of her must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) force damage and is pushed 10 feet away from her. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed. Shtriga Nonna can then move up to twice her speed, after which the extra cat legs disappear.

legendary.name: Action 3: Open the Oven
entries: Shtriga Nonna opens a portal to her massive oven in the palms of her hands, creating a blast of heat and noise in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

hp.special: Six times their level (number of d6 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The apprentice can breathe air and water.

action.name: Signature Attack (Zap)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when the apprentice reaches 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

action.name: 3rd Level: Wash Away (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the apprentice rides a crashing wave. They make a signature attack against an enemy within 5 feet of them and move up to their walking speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the attack hits, it deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Ride the Lightning (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the apprentice supercharges their foe's nervous system. The apprentice makes a signature attack, and if it deals damage to a creature, the target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition incapacitated} and their speed is halved until the end of their next turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Drown (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the apprentice chooses three creatures the apprentice can see within 60 feet of them. Each target feels as though their lungs are filling with water and must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. A creature who can breathe water or who doesn't need air automatically succeeds on this saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage PBd8} force damage, and for 1 minute, they can't speak, their speed is halved, and they are {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect. Another creature within 5 feet of a target can use their action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength (Athletics) or Intelligence (Medicine) check, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The harpy can't use their blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 3d4 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition charmed} by the harpy, they are also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the harpy can't use their Talons attack on another target.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Alluring Song
entries: The harpy starts singing a beautiful song. They continue singing until they choose to stop (no action required) or until they become {@condition deafened} or {@condition incapacitated}. When a non-harpy creature starts their turn within 200 feet of the singing harpy, if that creature shares a language with the harpy and can hear them, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the harpy until the harpy stops singing or the target can't hear them anymore.

While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target can't willingly move on their turn, and they can't attack, damage, or target any unwilling harpy with any effect. If the {@condition charmed} target takes damage from a source other than a harpy, they can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success.
A creature who succeeds on a saving throw to resist or end this effect is immune to the Alluring Song of all harpies for 1 hour.

bonus.name: Beckon
entries: The harpy chooses any number of creatures {@condition charmed} by their Alluring Song. Each target must use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed in a direction chosen by the harpy. If this movement would lead the target into hazardous terrain, they can make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw before moving. On a successful save, the target's reaction is not used and they are no longer {@condition charmed} by Alluring Song.

trait.name: Chorus of Death
entries: If the starving harpy hears a harpy's Alluring Song, they can start harmonizing (no action required). The starving harpy continues harmonizing until the song ends, until they choose to stop harmonizing, or until they become {@condition deafened} or {@condition incapacitated}. For each starving harpy harmonizing, the range of the song increases by 50 feet, and the save DCs for the singing harpy's Alluring Song action and Beckon bonus action both increase by 1 (maximum DC increase of 5).

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The harpy can't use their blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the harpy takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the harpy takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Grasping Talons (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, the harpies can move them 5 feet in any direction. If the attack was made by three or more harpies, they can move the target 10 feet instead of 5.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The harpy can't use their blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

action.name: Signature Attack (Talons)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d4 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the fledgling can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Wind Sweep (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the fledgling moves up to their flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If they end this movement within 5 feet of an enemy they can see, the fledgling can make a signature attack against them.

action.name: 5th Level: Food Grab (3/Day)
entries: When the fledgling hits a Medium or smaller creature with a signature attack, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). The fledging then moves up to their fly speed without provoking opportunity attacks (no action required). While grappling the target, the fledgling can't attack another creature.

action.name: 7th Level: Harpy Song (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the fledgling starts singing for 1 minute. Each creature within 60 feet of the fledgling who can hear them and who understands Common or Giant must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the fledgling until they can't hear the fledgling singing anymore. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature can't willingly harm any of the fledgling's allies.

monster.name: Hellhound
languages: understands Common and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Hardened by Flame
entries: When the hound is subjected to fire damage, they take no damage. Instead, their skin darkens and hardens, and their AC increases to 18 until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Stealthy Hunter
entries: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track other creatures and on Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide from creatures who are unaware of their presence.

action.name: Hellish Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Hellfire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The hound exhales flame in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature who isn't a hellhound who fails the saving throw is lit on fire for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn), or until the target or another creature who can reach them uses an action to extinguish the flames. A creature who is on fire at the start of their turn takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If a creature who is already on fire is set on fire again on a subsequent turn, the damage isn't cumulative, but the duration of the fire resets to 1 minute.

reaction.name: Tug of War
entries: When an enemy within 5 feet of the hound hits the hound with a melee attack, the hound can make a Hellish Bite attack against that enemy. If the hound's attack hits, the enemy is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}), and if the triggering attack was a weapon attack, the weapon used in the triggering attack can't be used to make any more attacks while the target is {@condition grappled}. The grapple ends if the hound attacks a different target with Hellish Bite.

monster.name: Hellhound Cur
languages: understands Common and Infernal but can't speak

trait.name: Crossfire
entries: If a creature starts their turn within 10 feet of two or more curs, that creature takes {@damage 4} fire damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the cur takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the cur takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Hellish Bite (Group Attack)
